title.narrative: JOFA- Protecting Children During the COVID-19 crisis and Beyond

description.narrative: This programme has been designed for short term and long term where the short term is to respond rapidly to the global COVID-19 pandemic emergency. While the longterm seeks to address child protection issues/concerns in Kenya while working with key stakeholders like the government of Kenya.
Expenditure 2020

comment.narrative: The initial budget allocated for children's airtime was reduced by half. This allowed us to support additional 8 children from Mombasa and Marsabit Counties. Furthermore, Mtoto News used the same platform to facilitate participation of additional 7 children from Kitui, Nairobi, Machakos, Kwale and Narok Counties. This activity was implemented during the reporting period . The expenses will reflect in the next Quarter.;
